tok:
---

title: sike musi

alt: Playing with a ball on the beach, a Bengali child winds up for another kick with a splash.

suno li seli. taso, telo li lete pona. 

mi musi kepeken sike. 

mi musi mute a.

sike li tawa sewi. sike li tawa anpa. 

sike li tawa weka. mi wile alasa!

sike li lon seme? a, mi jo e ona. 

taso, a! mi pilin pakala.

mi jo ala e ijo ante…

mi jo ala e jan musi poka.
en:
The sun is hot. But, the liquid is nicely cold.

I play using a ball. 

I play alot, ah.

The ball goes up. The ball goes down. 

The ball goes away. I need to search!

The ball is at where? Ah, I have it.

But, alas! I feel broken.

I do not have another thing…

I do not have a nearby playmate.
sp:
suno li seli  
taso telo li lete pona

mi musi kepeken sike

mi musi mute a

sike li tawa sewi  
sike li tawa anpa

sike li tawa weka  
mi wile alasa a

sike li lon seme  
a mi jo e ona

taso, a  
mi pilin pakala

mi jo ala e ijo ante  

mi jo ala e jan musi poka
